name: Zombie Giraffe Snowballocalypse
description:
Zombies giraffes are everywhere! Only snowballs can save you now

Use mouse and keyboard to move around. Gather a snowball by looking down and clicking. Throw the snowballs at the zombie giraffes!

The collisions don't seem to work that well. :(

Made in 2+ hours for the 1-hour game jam. So sue me!
